hooks.command: case "{{filepath}}" in *.env|*.env.*|*credentials*|*.secret*|*.pem|*.key) echo 'BLOCKED: Do not edit secrets/credential files' >&2; exit 1 ;; esac
cd $CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR && uv run ruff check --fix {{filepath}} 2>/dev/null; uv run ruff format {{filepath}} 2>/dev/null; true
case "{{filepath}}" in */frontend/*.ts|*/frontend/*.tsx) cd $CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/frontend && npx eslint --fix {{filepath}} 2>/dev/null; true ;; esac
